privacyDisclaimer:
At Openversum, we take your privacy seriously.
We understand that providing us with your personal information is an act of trust, and we are committed to protecting your trust.
We will not share any of your personal information with third parties without your express permission. We will never sell your personal data to third parties.
We also strive to protect your data through data encryption and other security measures.
We recognize that the security of your data is important, and we will make every effort to protect it.
If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy and use of your personal information, please contact us at info@openversum.com.
